title: New SRAM Patent Reveals Possible 3rd Generation Red AXS Lever
content:
A recent patent from SRAM reveals an all-new brake lever design that may materialize as part of the next-generation SRAM Red AXS group.

Read the full article at New SRAM Patent Reveals Possible 3rd Generation Red AXS Lever on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
